channel.title: Categories on Fergus Taylor
channel.description: Recent content in Categories on Fergus Taylor

item.description: A project mapping SIMD health data onto Arran. Later combined with postcode data, gifs and interactive maps. The Github repository.. Arran And the site. fergustaylor.github.io/Arran

A project mapping drug interactions listed in the BNF. Working with hierachical edge bundling algorithms. This was started in the repository D3, which I also use for other d3.js examples. But information on collecting BNF data, as well as an updated graphic has now been moved to bnf-interactions. The Github repository.. bnf-interactions And the site. fergustaylor.github.io/bnf-interactions

This is ‘Dev’, a Github repository for all the smaller projects I’m working on. Searchable clinical knowledge summaries, visualising local election results or the Humanitarian Data Exchange.. Even just interesting plots. Not all of it is complete, but it’s a good place to keep everything else. The Github repository.. Dev And the site. fergustaylor.github.io/Dev

A project importing OpenPrescribing.net data directly into RStudio. As well as another package returning default plots on given BNF parameters. The Github repositories.. openprescribingR openprescribingRplots
